Strings.Text: {scroll 2}‟The shape of the fountain\nchanges based on the {clear 0}\ncombination of the gears.”{clear 0}{clear 0}{timed 1}
{scroll 2}‟Please dump your trash in\na trash can.”
{scroll 2}It would appear to be \nunder construction beyond {clear 0}\nthis point.
{scroll 2}A control panel for the\nfountain.{clear 0}Will you open the lid?\n{branch 0}
